items.question: Will the system work if the internet goes down?
items.answer: Yes. Thanks to PWA technology, the system works offline and synchronizes data with the server as soon as the connection is restored.

items.question: Is it hard to train staff?
items.answer: No. The interface is as simple as Instagram. Waiters master it completely within 5 minutes.

items.question: Is customer data secure?
items.answer: Absolutely. We use bank-level encryption. Your data belongs only to you.

items.question: Which devices does it work on?
items.answer: Any device: iPhone, Android, Tablet, or Laptop. No need to buy special hardware.
